DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate psychometric validity FASS ( Facial Summary Score Scale ) ass postoperative child pain .
DOC.brief_title: FASS ( Facial Action Summary Score ) Scale Differentiate Pain Postoperative Anxiety Children Under 7 Years
DOC.criteria: Children surgery Younger 7 year old Elective surgery Patient whose parent give nonopposition Psychological retardation Chronic pain
